derivation: a primitive root; also as denominative from H3843 (לְבֵנָה)
outline:
1. to be white
    1. (Hiphil)
      1. to make white, become white, purify
      2. to show whiteness, grow white
    2. (Hithpael) to become white, be purified (ethical)
  2. (Qal) to make bricks
strongs_def: to be (or become) white;  to make bricks
